# Analytics Tracking Plan

# 7 Basic
- visit page view
- path/ page
- avg. visit duration
- bounce rate
- user/ retention user
- demographic location
- referrals

# 5 Advances
- Track home to product page
- Track home to download click
- Scroll depth
- Contact form
  - form submit
  - input tab index/ focus
- Minimum visit duration per user
  - Time: 30 sec
